## Massage Therapy for Your Health and Wellbeing

Treating yourself to a therapeutic and relaxing massage at Aegean is more than
just a bit of time to yourself—our professional massage therapists can
personalize your experience to help reduce stress; ease pain, muscle soreness,
and tension; improve circulation, energy, alertness; lower heart rate and
blood pressure; and even improve immune function.

BOOK YOUR MASSAGE TREATMENT

## Massage

Swedish and sports massages are available at Aegean Med Spa.

### Swedish Massage (30, 60, or 90 Minutes)

Relax and unwind as you enjoy a 30, 60, or 90-minute massage at your desired
pressure range. Our massages are completely customized to fit your needs. Not
only will you experience physical benefits such as the loosening of tight
muscles and the release of toxins, but you will also feel a decrease in stress
and anxiety.

30, 60, or 90 Minutes

Book 30 Minutes – $50

Book 60 Minutes – $90

Book 90 Minutes – $125

### Deep Tissue Massage (30, 60, or 90 Minutes)

Our deep tissue massages focus on realigning the deeper layers of the
connective and muscle tissue. We use slow strokes and intense pressure to
penetrate to deeper layers of muscle and tense areas to relieve severe
tension. This massage is recommended for those who suffer from chronic tension
or experience consistent pain and soreness.

30, 60, or 90 Minutes

Book 30 Minutes – $65

Book 60 Minutes – $100

Book 90 Minutes – $135

### Hot Stone (30, 60, or 90 Minutes)

Our Hot Stone Massage uses heat to relax the muscles.

30, 60, or 90 Minutes

Book 30 Minutes – $65

Book 60 Minutes – $100

### Prenatal Massage

Our Prenatal Massage is perfect for expecting mothers who are past their first
trimester.

Book 30 Minutes – $50

Book 60 Minutes – $90

Book 90 Minutes – $125

You can also call 252-617-7234 to schedule your massage today!
